Key Match Events: Phoenix Suns rallied from a 15-point deficit to defeat the Miami Heat 115-112
Durant’s jumper from the free-throw line with 16 seconds to play gave Phoenix a four-point lead
Bradley Beal’s 3-pointer put the Suns ahead to stay at 106-103 with 3:52 to play
Post-Match Reflections: Booker made one of two free throws with 4.8 seconds to go, giving the Heat a chance, but Miami failed to get a shot off before time expired
Devin Booker had 22 points and nine assists for Phoenix (7-1), which has won its last five games by six points or fewer
Grayson Allen scored 12 points and Tyus Jones matched Booker with nine assists for the Suns
